title: Customized Immersive Learning Program for Strengthening SDGs Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and practical experience in professional fields
context.additional_context: A program developing leadership competencies for SDGs implementation through learner collaboration and interdisciplinary approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can design collaboration strategies among key stakeholders for achieving the SDGs
Learners can present three or more ways to link their professional field (medical/legal/technical) with the SDGs
Learners can develop and implement practical action plans to solve community problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
